resources.string: Data of this report is updated every hour.

The credit for all the data available on the Covid Tracker goes to Apify. 

 Due to their API https://apify.com/covid-19, it is being possible to get the data in such an easy way and every developer must visit it for any sort of API they are in search of. 



Some of the important features provided by Apify are 

 * Providing APIs 
 * Web Scrapping 
 * Web Automation 
 * Web Integration
